title: The Girl and her trust
brief_description: An attempted train robbery by some tramps goes awry when a young telephonist alerts the next station. Features a great train chase. Cast includes Dorothy Bernard, Wilfred Lucas, Edwin August, Charles Gorman, Walter Long. Silent film with English intertitles.
